description: The Mount Snow Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Mount Snow for the snow report
Alexa, ask Mount Snow for latest conditions
imageAltText: Snow Report for Mount Snow icon
name: Snow Report for Mount Snow
shortDescription: The Mount Snow Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Mount Snow.
